mapper.select: SELECT p.*, pc.content, pc.draw_content FROM kb_page p LEFT JOIN kb_page_content pc ON pc.version_id = p.latest_version_id AND pc.page_id = p.id WHERE p.id = #{pageId}
mapper.update: UPDATE kb_page SET CREATED_BY = #{base.createdBy}, CREATION_DATE=#{base.creationDate}, LAST_UPDATED_BY=#{base.lastUpdatedBy}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE=#{base.lastUpdateDate} WHERE id = #{pageId}
